_comment: Created by ianb on 01/08/2014 12:47:50 using v2.1
title: Can patients successfully get an NHS dentistry appointment?
analysis_commentary: In 2012/2013 60% of respondents to the GP patient survey have tried to get an appointment in the last two years and the majority of these patients were successful in getting an NHS dentist appointment (93%). This remains largely unchanged since the questions was asked in the 2011/2012 survey and when asked again in the latest surveys of late 2013 / early 2014.
